health_tech: FHIR APIs for patient data exchange

evidence.claim: Company mentions FHIR standards for health records interchange.
Putnam County HomeCare & Hospice emphasizes HIPAA compliance in their infrastructure.
Integration patterns with EHRs noted in collaboration documents
References to using cloud-based platforms for patient care management.
